description.ko: VOID-3가 중력이 빛을 왜곡하고 멀리 있는 별들이 유령처럼 아름다운 보라색 심연 속으로 사라지는 '우주의 심해' 속 고요한 공간을 떠다닙니다.
description.en: VOID-3 drifts through the silent expanse of the Cosmic Deep, where gravity warps light and the distant stars fade into a hauntingly beautiful violet abyss.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the VOID-3 spacecraft floating near the event horizon of a supermassive black hole, surrounded by a swirling violet and gold accretion disk, nebular dust clouds, photorealistic, 8k resolution, dark atmosphere, deep space aesthetics, high contrast lighting.
